name: Food Waste Innovation Network
goal: FoodWIN is the European Innovation Network. It supports entrepreneurs and innovators from across Europe who tackle food waste. With that knowledge, FoodWIN helps local governments, hospitals, schools and food companies to reduce food waste.
interests: Agriculture, Climate Action, Food Safety, International co-operation and development, Maritime affairs and fisheries
euInitiatives:
EU FUSIONS: involved in organizing events
EU REFRESH: involved by organising events
Saving Food 2.0: working with Feedback Global to develop an app to redistribute food surplus
